sageBinary.label: Sage Binary Path
sageBinary.help: Path to sage CLI binary (auto-detected from PATH if empty)

sageBinary.description: Path to sage binary (default: auto-detect from PATH)

autoInjectContext.description: Inject Sage tool context into the agent at start (default: true)

autoSuggestSkills.description: Suggest relevant skills at agent start (default: true)

suggestLimit.description: Max number of skill suggestions to include (default: 3)

maxPromptBytes.description: Max prompt bytes forwarded to suggestion search (default: 16384)

injectionGuardMode.description: Injection guard mode: warn or block (default: warn)

injectionGuardScanAgentPrompt.description: Scan the agent's initial prompt in before_agent_start (default: true when enabled)

injectionGuardScanGetPrompt.description: Scan sage_get_prompt results and warn/block (default: true when enabled)

injectionGuardUsePromptGuard.description: Use HuggingFace Prompt Guard if configured (default: false)

injectionGuardIncludeEvidence.description: Include evidence snippets in warnings (default: false)
